explanation: [0-0] A group of people is standing in a brightly lit room. On the left are some girls bending over, with a little girl in a blue dress and purple-glowing shoes in front of them, preparing for a rock-paper-scissors game. On the right are some boys, some bending over and some squatting on the ground. Among the boys is a tall man in a black shirt and white plaid pants, with his shoes emitting a blue glow. He is bending over and facing the girl in the blue dress, also preparing for the rock-paper-scissors game.

[0-2] Then, the light shines on the eyes of the two people. They start the rock-paper-scissors game and raise their arms. After putting them down, the girl in the blue dress sticks out scissors while the man makes a fist. The boys show happy expressions, and the girl in the blue dress turns around and returns to her teammates.
